## composeMappingTemplate() function

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Composes a mapping template for Amazon API Gateway.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function composeMappingTemplate(items: MappingTemplateItem[]): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  items | [MappingTemplateItem](./mapping-template-compose.mappingtemplateitem.md)<!-- -->\[\] |  |

**Returns:**

string

## Remarks

This function is intended to compose a mapping template that generates a JSON object.

You have to represent a key-value pair (field, or property) in a JSON object as a two-element array `[key, value]` (see [KeyValue](./mapping-template-compose.keyvalue.md)<!-- -->). When they are rendered in a JSON object, `key` is surrounded with double quotation marks ("), but `value` is left as-is.
